channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Blocking of footpath with no alternative, 25th February
item.description:
Damaged wall of house has safety barriers in place, but these completely block the footpath, causing pedestrians to briefly move onto the road, where the speed limit is 50 MPH. There is no footpath immediately on the other side of the road that could be used instead. Wall needs to be repaired in order for the path to be made clear.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Shurdington Road, Badgeworth, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: TMC - Defects - Kerbs and Channels problem, 25th February
item.description:
Loose and broken dropped kerb Please lift and replace kerb 900x150m Standard TM with temp fw closure Stats (FW Kerbing Defects)
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Cracked and raised paving slabs, 25th February
item.description:
Raised paving slabs and badly cracked slabs. They have been here for at least 10 yrs. Elderly residents live in Strickland Rd, I went out with my walker and very nearly fell over. Other residents have sticks, frames etc. So this problem remains dangerous.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 24, Strickland Road, Ewens Farm, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet
